TextAsset.value: so yeah lets get this romance started i guess
...I know you’re just doing your whole weird “this is all a game” stuff, but…
Man, that’s kinda rude to just come out and say!
I just wanted to join a cool club.
yeah youre right
just cuz youre playing a game doesnt mean i should be all creepy or whatever
but here let me give you a hint
when i say the phrase “so is that what you really think of me” later
say “i think i love you davesprite” to trigger the right thing so you can do the next event with me
i know it sounds weird but im just doing you a favor
You want me to say that when you ask “So is that what you really think of me”, huh?
well i mean whatever you wanna do
its just the best option straight-up
Uh huh, okay. I’ll remember.
So, like… let’s say I’m playing along, and I buy this whole “game” thing.
Are you experiencing this like you’re actually playing a game?
Pressing buttons and stuff?
nah i experience stuff the same way you do
grass and trees around
all that good stuff
pretty much the same way i experienced stuff in the uh
the other game i was a part of
That’s another thing I wanted to ask you about.
If you were in another game before, when did you come here?
Do you remember that?
Did you come to, uh, “this game” on purpose?
look ${slot:playerName} that stuff is basically pointless to worry about
its kinda best not to examine this situation too closely
well get into a whole worlds within worlds psychological warp deal
im not too interested in going that direction with this
For someone who’s supposed to have “omniscient game knowledge”...
You sure like being obtuse when I actually ask you questions!
yeah youre really peeling away the layers here
falling in love with me yet
Haha, shut up.
Okay, so what do we do in “Webcomics club” anyway?
haha i didnt really think that far ahead
i guess we could make some comics or something
is that a dumb idea?
i dont really know what to do here
im basically just waiting for this event to end so we can move on
Um! Well, it doesn’t sound dumb exactly…
It’s just that I’ve never really drawn much before.
But if that’s what Webcomics Club is all about, then sure!
thats the spirit
webcomics arent really about drawing well anyway
you should see some of the garbage out there
put two characters in a panel and make it look like they might kiss and people will trip over themselves to throw money at you
its a pretty sweet gig
lets see what should i make a comic about
some kind of video game thing probably
okay here we go done
That was fast….
okay ill wait for you to finish yours
(Jeez, I have no idea what to do here…
… Um… Wow… This is harder than I thought it would be.
Well, this idea is kinda dumb, but it’ll have to do.)
Okay, I’m done.
cool
okay check it
Huh… there’s something familiar about that comic…
careful
dont you start getting meta now
thats my thing
Huh??!
No, I mean…
Well, it’s probably better to just show you…
Boy, this is pretty weird.
what
whats going on
if youre trying to mess with me
well dont
youre freaking me out
Here! This is the comic I made!
whoah
I know, right?!
Isn’t it weird that we thought of the same thing?!
it would be pretty weird
except for the fact
that we are obviously soulmates
WHAT?! Really?!
You think we’re soulmates?!
yeah
completely
the prophets foretold of our meeting
and said it was gonna be hella kawaii
I, uh… Um, that is...
relax ${slot:playerName} im just messin with you
we just both have scarily impeccable taste in webcomics is all
Oh… haha. Yeah.
I knew you were just kidding.
(I can’t believe I’m actually a little disappointed.)
(haha yeah i bet you are)
So uh… your comic is pretty, um…
Interesting.
Is that something you do as a hobby, or what…?
uh i dont really know
i guess its something the original dave liked to do
the guy i was copied from i mean
im basically a second version of that guy
so its hard to know whats actually unique about me
its kind of a drag but whatever
i guess sometimes i do bird stuff
because im part bird or something?
its hard to explain i guess but sometimes i get urges
like some bird seed would seriously hit the spot right now
Maybe you could ask Blue Max if he has any…?
yeah i thought about it but like
i figure hes the bird guy right
he probably has people asking where they can get some fresh hot birdseed all the time
like every day
hes probably sick of it
so ill try to be cool and not ask
Somehow I doubt that too many people are asking about birdseed here.
i wish i had better stuff to tell you ${slot:playerName}
but i guess the reason i try to talk about game stuff all the time
is cuz its kinda the only thing i have to talk about
im hardly even a real person
i was created to help the original dave through his game
and now that im not in that game anymore i dunno how useful my existence is anymore
thats pretty much all i think about actually because the more i turn it over in my brain the more it seems like theres really no answer to that question
im straight up totally pointless
i dont even know why youre hanging out with me because it must be pretty boring to hear a guy just go on and on about a bunch of what seems like nonsense
sorry
i dont even know what im saying really
Well, even though I don’t really know what you’re talking about half the time…
I’m having fun hanging out with you.
I don’t really care if you’re the “original” or whatever.
yeah but its gotta be a downer to hear about right
i mean the only thing i really have to offer is a quick path to the best ending
you dont wanna hear all my dumb angsty drama
Actually, I’m really glad I asked you about your “drama”!
It’s the only way I could get you to shut up about the game stuff.
It even kinda makes me wonder if you keep pretending to be a game guide who knows everything...
So you don’t have to talk about your real issues.
wow really cutting to the heart of it arent you
did you come to that conclusion in armchair psychology 101
I just like talking to you, Davesprite.
You’re… kinda inscrutable, but pretty cool.
so
is that what you really think of me?
… ... "I love you, Davesprite."
man its pretty depressing to hear you just say it like that
not meaning it just
rotely going through the motions because i told you to
i feel like a huge jerk now actually
no its more than that
whats this
emotions coursing through my digital body
im just a game sprite…
i was never meant to feel…
this……
emotions OVERLOADING MY PROGRAMMING
Davesprite!
Are you okay?!
haha just messin with you that stuffs fake
haha cool that was actually pretty funny
i wonder if you actually said the word or if it was bleeped in your mind too
Huh?!
nevermind haha
okay whatever ill let you trigger the next event anyway
youre pretty cool for a space rolling fake video game person
Uh, yeah… back at you, I guess.
okay i think thats enough
we may have just been passing time in the event but at least it was kinda fun
so thanks i guess
Thank you, Davesprite. I had fun too.
Although, I wonder…
If you’re just a game guide, can you, uh…
Can you actually like me, or do you just think I’m some kind of..
Fictional … video game thing?
look dont worry about it
thinking too much about the logistics of this will just mess you up
ill see you next time
unless you pick another character to chill with
which is totally cool btw
(Darn, I was actually hoping for a real answer on that one.)
(i know you were buddy)
...Davesprite, you’re just staring at me blankly again.
sorry about that
see you later ${slot:playerName}
